basics.name: Roshan Ayyalasomayajula
basics.label: Assistant Professor
basics.summary: Assistant Professor in the Department [Computer Science and Engineering](https://cse.buffalo.edu) at the [University at Buffalo, SUNY](https://buffalo.edu).

work.name: Computer Science and Engineering Department, University at Buffalo, SUNY
work.summary: I am an Assistant Professor in the Department [Computer Science and Engineering](https://cse.buffalo.edu) at the [University at Buffalo, SUNY](https://buffalo.edu). I have started at UB in Fall, 2023 and I am currenlty looking to build my lab @ UB (more on this [here](/news/)).
highlights: My research interests are the intersection of wireless sensing and machine learning with applications to the IoT, indoor navigation, XR, and robotics.

awards.title: Nobel Prize in Physics
awards.summary: The Nobel Prizes are five separate prizes that, according to Alfred Nobel's will of 1895, are awarded to 'those who, during the preceding year, have conferred the greatest benefit to humankind.'
